A name that you would like to give to th: The working directory to be used by the pipeline during the run.
The directory where C-PAC will store crash logs.
Directory where CPAC should place run logs.
The output directory for the pipeline.
Path to a set of AWS credentials if your output directory is set to an S3 bucket.
Enable server-side 256-AES encryption on data to the S3 bucket.
A list where ‘1’ represents ‘yes’ and ‘0’ represents ‘no’ (e.g., ‘[1]’).

A name that you would like to give to th: Create a user-friendly, well-organized version of the output directory.
A list where ‘1’ represents ‘yes’ and ‘0’ represents ‘no’ (e.g., ‘[1]’).

A name that you would like to give to th: Deletes the contents of the Working Directory after running. Saves disk space, but steps will need to be re-run.
Uses the contents of the Working Directory to regenerate all outputs and their symbolic links.
